content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 2010 on the night of july 20/21 i was camping in my van right next to the old abandoned "pioneer gold mine" right next to the river which is located approximately 5 kilometers east from the very small town of brailorn british columbia which is located approximately 150 km north of vancouver, british columbia, canada. 
   i was woken up to a somewhat loud sound but not too loud as it did not wake my friend who was sleeping right behind me in his truck. the sound mostly resembled an amplifier hum. i was sleeping under a sleeping bag and had a t shirt on and had my arms out of the sleeping bag. while this sound was being heard by me my hairs on my arms stood on end just like i was being effected by static electricity, this event only lasted approximately 5 seconds. it was pitch black outside, and i was really kind of scared to take a look outside to see what it was so i just lied back down and went back to sleep.

fyi i am a believer in u.F.Os. and i'm a member of *(possible identifying information deleted--cms/sg)and have seen the disclosure project video by dr. steven greer as well as many others, so i will tell you that i think a u.F.O. flew over my van in that valley. now whether it was an alien craft or a human reproduction craft i'm not sure but i'm personally convinced that it was a ufo so to speak.  

i would like to hear of any other reports like this in that area at that time. 

signed: *(possible identifying information deleted--cms/sg) thanks.
content.summary: Woken to amplifier humming sound and hair on arms stood on end due to static electrisity

content.detailedDescription:
Today, 10-10-10 at 1:20 p.M.  i notice two small black planes traveling close together in norcross ga.

  when i first notice them i was traveling down holcomb bridge rd. heading toward jimmy carter blvd. i noticed them because they where traveling very close together almost side by side, the one on the right was slightly behind the plane on the left.  as i continued to watch them it looked as though the plane on the right was trying to catch up with the plane on the left or  possibly chasing it.  i watch the plane on the right catch up with the other plane and they flew side by side at  a very high rate of speed.  i lost sight of them due to their speed and some trees!  i drove past my turn to get an better look but they where gone!   the planes had an odd dark haze outlining them.    there has been several objects in the sky in this area in the past week! 

thank!
content.summary: Strange black planes traveling close together!

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
this is my first ufo experience.On thursday october the 7th. at approximately 8.55 pm i was sitting outside with my wife looking at the nighttime sky.It was a beautiful starry night.We brought two chairs out to the patio and place them in a south east direction.We even turned all the lights off in the house which made a big difference for viewing the sky.We were not outside 5 minutes when i laid my head back against the chair when a huge v shape craft silently and almost invisible flew over the house in a se direction!!I couldn,t beleive my eyes.The v was red.It was very faint,almost transparent, it wasn't a perfect v it looked like somebody took a red can of spraypaint and made a sloppy v (or it seemed to be changing shape,i'm not sure)inside the arms of the v were orange balls i wouldn't call them lights i can't say they gave off any light.It also blocked out the stars.I felt a bit unnerved at this point because i realized it must be huge.It covered the whole sky in about 4 to 5 seconds.I don't know if it went out of my field of vision or just disappeared.Iws very excited after seeing this object,it was as if i had a revelation i thought to myself all those people that have reported something like this can't all be crazy.I had to tell somebody, so i called my brother. i wanted to report this to the police but my wife talked me out of it until today october 10 2010 .I googeled v shape ufo.Turns out this exact craft was reported fly above the kennedy space centre in florida.This person describes exactly what i saw.

also about 3 minutes after the sighting a helicopter flew into the same area,just like the case in florida.The hair on the back of my neck was standing up when i compared my notes from the other night to this sighting in florida.
i would love to hear from anyone who might have seen the same craft.I feel like i need to tell people about this experience.

thank you

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
p.S. i did make sketches of the object.
content.summary: A red v shape craft flew over my house october 7th at 8.55 pm est

content.detailedDescription:
I own a house on top of a mountain, level with two other mountain ridges.  it was 9/12 during the no flight zone after 9/11.  we don't have a detailed recollection because we never thought we would make a formal report of what we saw, but we talked about it this morning, and seem to both still remember it the same way.  

the sun had set, but it was still light out.  we were out on my deck.  a ball of light came into my sight and i pointed it out to my boyfriend.  we talked about the no flight zone, and continued to watch it hover.  we don't recall it moving.  it was just over the ridge, too low and close to be aircraft or a satilite.  when it disappeared was when we both freaked out and assured each other that we had seen the same thing and that it seemed totally unexplainable.

there is a flight pattern that goes directly over my house headed north east toward san jose airport, but this was further west.

sorry we don't have futher details, and the time we provided is a guesstimate that we both agreed opon.

we saw your show this morning and realized that you have the resorces to possibly colaborate our story with another witnesse's account.  this is not something that has caused us duress, although we feel that as of that night we both became convinced of the existance of extra tarestrial life.
content.summary: Ball of light appeared, hovered and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We were having our yearly vaction.We went to las vegas and headed out to the grand canyon.On our way back to las vegas, we saw a cylinder surrounded or consumed in diamond shaped light.We pulled out the camera and tried to take a picture but the camera's battery died.We tried again, but it died again.Finally we got a very good picture.Then it was gone.
content.summary: Hovering bright light

content.detailedDescription: It has been occurring everynight for about a month,i like to watch the night skies one night i seen a strobing what i thought was a star and i had my significant other look through the binoculars as well,if there is a clear night you can see them last night there was about twenty of them,i cant believe people are not seeing them.I was standing in my driveway looking in the direction west towards thee ocean when i seen what i thought was a star but it was too long so i got the binoculars out and looked throuh them and seen they were strobing multi colored lights even though they were strobing the object was stationary.
content.summary: Strobing lights green,red,yellow,blue lights that are stationary

content.detailedDescription: I was grilling outside in the backyard. i was just finishing up. it was a very clear september day. blue sky, no clouds. as luck would have it, everyone had since gone inside the house leaving me alone. i happened to look upward toward the direction of the north east. at that time i noticed what looked like a flying telephone pole. no wings, no contrails. it appeared to be as high as a small plane could or would fly. i'm guessing about maybe 3000 ft. this object flew from the north east over me in a south western direction. no sound i could tell. this lasted about 5 min. it went from one horizon to another in that time. i had heard of "rods", maybe this was one of them. it was fast, under some kind of direction. it went straight until out of sight. almost like a "slow" moving jet. i was surprised. but maybe not totally suprised, i keep an open mind.
content.summary: Cylinder shaped object flew over with no wings, silent, appeared black. from horizon to horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
Cabo san lucas, bc, mexico.
2300hrs sitting on balcony of hotel facing towards the southeast.Noticed 3 bright orange objects flying at first in a triangle formation accross the sky then made a vertical turn and disapeared.Another single object then 3 or 4 then a couple of singles, this went on for several minutes all doing the same thing as the first 3, all disapearing in the same manner. they did not appear to be airplanes because no navigation lights were seen.The color of the objects were star like and a bright orange.I have observed many type of aircraft military and civilian and have never seen anything fly at that speed and make course changes so severe.I estimate a total of 10-12 objects seen, then disapeared.Watched sky for another 10 minutes or so nothing else seen. i hope someone else besides my wife and myself saw this and can explain.Very interesting.
content.summary: Orange bright light approx 10-12 objects flying in a irreagular formation.
content.locationName: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur

content.detailedDescription: We as a family took an annual trip to burnsville during the week between christmas and new years at a cabin north of burnsville to spend vacation and celebrate new years there. my husband and i always stayed upstairs in this a-frame home facing the river and the train tracks that were 2 or 3 hundred yards down hill from the cabin.  well it was always something we did with the kids, that is, we would meet in our room and tell stories at night. i know what your already thinking and that is why i have just dropped it even though it comes up often.  we were telling a story and we had it dark and we were all sitting around on floor and bed. we were all facing the big sliding glass doors which faced out over the river and train tracks. as we were talking we all noticed this red light, from that distance it was the size of maybe a small baseball, down around the track area.  we knew it wasn't a train because there was no noise, however we thought it might be one of those pump carts where a person checks out the track, but we didn't see any other lights, so we watched it. it seemed to glide at a pretty smooth consistant movement like it was going around the track but then on one side of the tracks was or is a very high bank which goes all the way up to the main highway that goes up and over the mountain. all of ther sudden it started darting up the bank and then down again and did this about 3 times, then returned to its smooth movement around what we knew as the direction of the track.  you go so far and then it makes a turn around to the left and goes behind some trees for a short distant where we lost track for a few seconds then it cleared the other side and continued on around for a few more seconds and where we would have lost sight of it completely, all of the sudden it shot like an arrow up in the sky like a bullet and dissapeared. we all just sat there for a moment in disbelief and then it was like the shock hit us and the kids and us said "oh my gosh did you just see that",  we were overwhelmed with what it could have been and the kids were scared wanting an explanation and we couldn't give them one.  i remember telling my husband we should tell someone and he like myself said they would think we had lost our minds and no one would take us serious anyway. what made me tell you all about this is, listening over the years and it seems more over the past 4 or 5 years maybe, that i hear people in their ufo sightings refer to a light of some sort just appearing and then disappearing suddenly.  i know this is a very small sighting of sorts but was watching your story today on *(name deleted--cms/sg)and bless his heart i know how i felt on a very small scale, so i know what he has gone through trying to report what he saw. the unknown is so intriging and interesting but when something does come up and is unexplainable, no one wants to really hear it. just thought i would share this for location sake and to see if it might have been something you have heard before. i certainly hope i have not wasted your time, but when we still talk to those kids whom are now yougn adults, that is still the question we all have.  what was that?  thank you for any info you might be able to share *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Red light down the hill over the railroad track moving over track up and down the banks and then on around and then shot straight up out of sight

content.detailedDescription: A bright soft orange boomerang shape object flew steadily about 10-15 feet away from my window on the morning of october 6. it's size was about as big as a flying crow. first it looked like a bended stick to me, that was steadily flying with its wide part facing the direction it was going. it was still pretty dark outside so i didnt see any more details other then the orange glow. very strange. this is my 3rd sighting from the window, but i was surprised because i've never heard of flying sticks. it's usually orange orbs seems like.
content.summary: A bright orange glowing stick/boomerang flew by window in the morning about 10-15 feel away from me.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were at my house, watching tv.  my friend noticed the bright object through my living room window, "what the heck is that?" he said.  we ran outside to check it out!  it was just to the west overhead, i got out my phone to video it after about 30 seconds of trying to figure out what it was.  it seemed to be 500 ft above us, but could have been further.  it had no sound, moved slowly.  i thought it may have been a hot air balloon, but the red/orange ball of fire seemed to have no flickering flames.  i noticed that it had a cylinder shape above the glowing ball, like a reflection of the ball of fire.  the ball of fire looked like the surface of the sun to me.  i do not have a clue to what it was.  i took video till it was lost through the trees.  it was traveling to the southeast, which is odd if it was a hot air balloon, cause usually our winds travel to the northeast?
content.summary: Ball of fire at the bottom of a cylinder shaped, slow moving and silent

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving down caneridge road toward bell road about 6:25 p.M. when i saw ahead a little ,.To the left of the tree line a stationery object.  i told my fiancee to look but he couldn't because he was driving.  i had him park in the target parking lot and look left when he saw the object too.  it then started to blink white and red and then it disappeared.  i went in target and came back out within 3 or 4 minutes and the object was gone.  but, in the sky as a black helicopter in the same area with a search light, it veered toward the left because it did not go in the direction of the mall which if going straight would have been seen again.

when i looked over the top of target, i sighted the object that i see nightly and have photographed for months.  i also talked with a neighbor across the street who verified that the object has been in this area for the five years since they moved into their house, and made the statement that it was a start and is not always here but it always comes back. i told him, "buddy, that's no star, stars don't come and go at will")

we left the parking lot and headed back up caneridge road toward old franklin road going southeast when i stated there is no way no one else sees these objects.  they are to close to be stars and are never really in the same place.  we then turned right going down ashford crossings while i continued looking at the normal object when all of a sudden there appeared another object.  my finacee said it was a plane because it was flashing, but i told him to stop the car on the side of the road at the top of the hill heading southeast to murfreesboro road and the object was stationery and blinking white and blue in a strobe-like fashion.  i said to him "that's no airplane."  we then continued to the intersection and looked back to where the object had been, but it was gone.

i have gone to google earth to try and locate the alignment of the planets and did find it so during september.  but this object is not in alignment with this correlation.  i have seen the object for three years but only starting photographing it since our encounter with the large craft in august.  i have video and pictures that i will forward to mr. mitchell since he called me after the august report.  in most of the pictures you see the light but in some you can make out a saucer shape, movement, and i believe i caught a triangular light pattern on october 8 when i stepped out onto my patio every hour or so to take photos.  you be the judge.

i and others have seen these objects and i have eyewitnesses that i personally pulled out of the citgo at hobson pike and hamilton church stored/gas station and a fireman at the firestation at murfreesboro road so that we are not the only witnesses to back up these sightings of these objects and their travel path through the sky.

i'm not sure how to load audio and video but i will try and get someone to help me do so.
content.summary: Driving west down caneridge road toward bell road, saw an object  stationery in the sky and started to blink, then disappear as a helicopter was seen in the same area

content.detailedDescription: It happened while i was sitting on a bicycle at the corner of a intersection. to my right was a church and a tall tree on the corner. to my left is a small open lot and next to that is a two story building. while i was sitting there i noticed something over head. i looked up and coming from my right just above the tree and church steeple was a giant object. as it moved from my right to my left i could see the bottom of it somewhat clearly and could tell it was flat black and had three white lights on it. one in the front and two in the back making a triangle shape. it moved from above the top of the tree to above the top of the two story building and out of my line of sight. the distance between the tree and two story building is about 100 ft and this object moved so slow it took about 5 or 6 seconds to travel that space. while overhead it was so slow and so close i could have thrown a rock at it and hit it but i didn't. i was very aware that this object was not making any noise and that it did not create any type of air wake like when a car or something passes you and it makes a wind blow on you.
content.summary: Giant triangle flies 50 ft right over my head

content.detailedDescription: Looked up into thre sky saw a white bright star and about a mile from it was a bright red light which was motionless but at the same hieght as the star and very bright as we continued walking up the street viewing it none of us could explain what it was then it dissappeard
content.summary: Red bright light high in the sky

content.detailedDescription: We were at the intersection of peck rd. and heritage rd. on the western edge of saint charles, il.  we were at a stop sign facing west.  ahead of us in the western sky we could distinctly see 12-15 reddish lights (looked like stars) that were obviously moving (heading) towards us (not across the sky). we watched the lights for several minutes before driving away.  we noticed that other people had pulled over to observe this occurrence. there were several cars pulled over in the parking lot of the kane county courthouse (rt. 38 & peck rd) that were angled to observe this. my wife asked me what it was and i told her i had no idea and that i have never seen anything like it before and that i have seen the aurora borealis, comets, meteor showers and shooting stars. the objects were vertically oriented in the sky rather than horizontally across the sky.  they were not in a straight line but were more random in formation. they were very separate from one another not closely formed but definitely in a cluster.
content.summary: 12-15 red / orange lights heading towards earth

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from watching sugar bowl in bossier city and we saw a cylinder hovering. we checked it out and took pictures.  ithovered for about 15  minutes and then we saw it move like it was weightless about 30 miles away. it only took about 15 seconds to make trip. i am sure it was ufo. others in area reported same ufo. we do have picture if u want
content.summary: My wife and i saw this for over an hour

content.detailedDescription:
I had first noticed a single orange ball hovering above the tree line at my apartment at 14111 big crest ln in woodbridge va. i was on my back porch smoking a cigarette when i noticed the light. i thought it could perhaps be a tower light but there's no towers in that direction. i never thought anything of it until it kept coming back for about 2 months. it never did any more than sit in the same spot above the tree line. it would get brighter and lesser and stuff but never move. one day i was walking out to my car and looking up at it and it started blinking. first really really slow like a surge every 4-5 seconds. but as it sped up it got very very bright. so bright it lit up like a spot light after it was at it's brightest flashing it just vanished like a scene from star trek when they do the hyper speed thing. i'm unaware if anybody else had seen it but i didn't see anyone else outside at the moment. i did have one girl witness it with me, an ex girlfriend but when she saw it she refused to believe it and would never speak of it like it was a taboo topic. we no longer speak.

 the fireworks incident was around the 4th of july because a resteraunt named tim's river shore had to be doing fireworks because i could see them over the tree line. ( the direction of the tree line is towards  rt 1 which leads down to this resteraunt) i was out on the back porch yet again watching the fireworks and noticed the bright orange ball in his normal spot just hanging out like usual when another one had floated our from behind it and it seemed to be trying to get a better position to watch the show from. they both sat there the 'main' one never moving but the other one would bob and switch sides every now and then. they wnt on for about 20-25 minutes and after they were over, the 'mover' circled the 'main' ship and left in a instant boost of speed normal crafts are not capable of. the main one sat about another 10 minutes and then did his same old flashing deal and then vanished like every other time.  haven't seen them since because i moved to an apartment about 10 minutes down the road. (10:35 a m i am currently watching the chris bledsoe animation and the orange balls are exactly what i saw. and the one zooming in was th same fashion as my 'mover') 


i am a 23 yr old and i do believe there is something out there and would like to help in the exposure of the truth to the public. thank you for your time.
content.summary: *chris bledsoe bright orange balls 'watching' fireworks

content.detailedDescription: I was working at a summer camp back in 2007 and one night later in june, some of the staff and i were going to go lay in the field and watch the stars that night. we all lay down in a row along the road embankment and started star gazing when someone saw a star that was a litter darker and larger than the rest, far off in the distance directly south of us. we thought it was just mars or jupiter and didn't think much about it. a few minutes later we looked back at it and noticed that it had moved a little upwards in the sky, at arms length, the distance of a dime. at that point we thought that it must have been some form of aviation. we thought it was military, because there is an armory and military airport within a few miles of the camp, so we once again ignored it to some extent. about twenty minutes had past, and at that point we could start to see that it wasn't just one light, a few minutes after that we could tell that it was three lights in a stationary triangular formation. we continued to think that it was just military and while it was right over us the circles of light were, at arms length, the size of dimes, twice the distance of their diameter away from one another and were a burnt orange color, darker on the edges and lighter, almost a yellow, in the middle. i was still convinced that it was military, until after it had past us. i started to question u.F.O when i noticed that it made absolutely no sound. i knew that no stealth jet or any military flying vehicle was that silent, and i didn't know of any that shape. we continued to watch it for another 30 or 40 minutes until it went out of our sight at the northern horizon. the craft moved very slowly across the sky in a straight line from north to south, taking about an hour and a half to go from one horizon to another. i have no evidence, mainly because the camp doesn't like the staff carrying electronics, and polaroid cameras were locked in the trading post. i cant remember the exact day it happened because it was years ago, but i think it was late july. i know it had to be between june and july because the camp is only opened for six weeks starting in june. i didn't report this incident until now because i didn't know where to make a report until i saw something on the discovery channel about m.U.F.O.N. most of the people i saw it with are still convinced it was military, but i wont agree until i have evidence. i'm reporting this to see if it helps in any way, and hopefully to find out what exactly i saw that night.
content.summary: Three circles of burnt-orange light in a triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: I was star gazing in my back yard when i noticed a bright light in nne sky abot 65 degrees above. light was not from an aircraft. i live in tampa air traffic pattern , and am a veteran of naval aviation. object was traveling ssw as it disapeared  leading me to believe it was losing altitude at a fast pace but was much to slow to be a meteor. light was constant, did not flicker and left to "tail" as a meteor would.Also there was no sound.  it seems to me all satellites from earth travel in a polar orbit or west to east or eliptical like iss. i'm not familiar with any satellites that travel east to west, or am i mistaken?
content.summary: I saw a bright object at extreme huigh altitude as it disapeared in the shadow of the earth

content.detailedDescription: I am finally reporting this just for the record.My friend & i were sitting on the beach in madison,ct.We were about 10-12yrs old.We were looking out over the water & saw a slow moving disc coming closer & closer to where we were sitting.There was no noise at all coming from the craft which was close enough to have heard some kind of propulsion.Disc shaped with small windows around it.As we watched this craft glide to our about 2:oo position it suddenly took off fast very fast leaving for a second or two a light trail.Before we could move two fighter jets came screaming following the same trajectory as the craft.Their noise scared us because we knew what they were chasing.Then we were collected by the "nanny" & told to get back to the house.It was a long time ago i will never forget it & i've been lloking ever since.I know what it was hence this report to people who also know what's going on.It was a life changing event for me.This field really is my passion & has been since that evening.Thanks to mufon for being..& to you who listened
content.summary: Saw low gliding object clearly pass by  beach  no noise

content.detailedDescription: Ball of light very very large i was 10 miles away on a mountin top .Ia seem to be tranlusent ande sold .My hair dress said a differt craft folled the a long was .They coud see it plan .And no noise. see was scared as her husband     i wasw drivind from ft learnard. we live on na small mountain ntop and can see very well towards.I wathced over2 hr whene i got home got a camera and toook a feww min of video    also look in your about this you will find it. i live in texas now. the army just bulit a live agent chomder there , they deal nwith nasty stuff i will dig up the video
content.summary: The object was there for some time i videoed it the next day my hair cutter said she and her husband were followed by smaller craft scared then to death   i was filming and felt somthing above bloock out stars the i ran  in the house .Mufon was there

content.detailedDescription:
Started as one white object about twice size as star. height - unknown - appeared extreemly high in atmosphere. another white cicle appeared about miles south west of first white circle. second circle split up to aprox 5 smaller cicrles that went into formation and moved around - prinicipally staying in same location in sky...All diapeared within 5 minutes. 
visibility was excellent during event. there are 5 witnesses - we were on my sailboat at the time. the only reason i noticed the objects, was because i happened to look up the main sail, and the objects appeared directly overhead. 
i have excellent vision and extensive knowledge of aircraft - this was definately not anything i have ever seen
content.summary: multiple circles - white - formations. very high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
I work at odot on the corner of state and airport road se here in salem.
i was sitting in my car,  as i usually do on afternoon breaks.  i was watching 3 eagles soaring and riding the thermals. they were so high and it was a awesome sight.

about 2:47, i know because i frequently check my watch or clock on my cell phone to be sure that i do not stay longer then 15 minutes.  anyway the eagles had moved towards the west.  something some motion,  caught my eye, so i transferred my gaze a bit towards the south.  all the sudden i could see one very bright star and i thought, thats strange, a star in daylight.  then i saw a 2nd one come in and that was followed by a 3rd, 4th and so on till i was sure there were 15-17 objects total.   at first i wondered if some balloons had gotten away, but that thought was quickly discarded when i saw the objects doing all kinds of movement, this was deliberate movement so i knew they could not be balloons, also i was pretty sure they would not reflect sunlight that brightly and they would have had to be hugh to be seen at that elevation. 

they would move out, come back, form a circle or a triangle.  they formed regular triangles and then elongated ones.  they would sit totally still and then start moving all of them at once and keep their distance from one another.. then they would stop etc.

about this time, 5-6 minutes into the sighting, i got out of my car and stood by it in the parking lot to get a better look, i was not able to see high enough, sitting in the car, so when i got out, i could see all the objects.  what i did not understand was how or why when people were walking by, no one seemed interested, or cared. they saw me looking up and glanced up and then just kept on walking.  i was so excited to be able to see something like this, i wish i had tried to take the pictures before, but it did not cross my mind.

about that time a manager in the building walked by, i asked him  do you see those objects?  his remark was no.. so i said  come over by my car  he did and then he said  oh i can see them  i said what are they? and his answer was  they are not planes, they are not birds and they are not balloons    and he added  but if i had my gun, i would shoot them.   i thought,  just what we need, a trigger happy witness  
about that same time they all disappeared but not before i was able to snap two pictures with my canon sx 200 is x12 camera.   the sun was so bright, the camera lens blacked out and i was not able to see what i was shooting at.. i just pointed in the direction of the objects.  

the total time of the sighting was 12-13 minutes.

the time was 3:01 and i had to go back inside.  i shared the sighting with a couple of co- workers but they were not that all interested.  so i took my camera and thought i would check and see if there was any thing on the 2 pictures i took.  yes there was an unmistakable bright star on the picture, the 2nd picture did not have any noticeable points of light showing against the blue sky.

so when i came home that night, i tired some enhancing software on the computer windows 2003 xp. what i saw was more confusing than the sighting itself.

i know the photos do not show much, but if you enhance or zoom on them, the objects do show up.
content.summary: Bright stars on a daylight blue sky

content.detailedDescription: My wife, son, and i were driving on route 130 west to go to merrillville, in, to shop. i was driving. we were driving west. when we were passing threw a small town called wheeler, my wife asked us both if we could see this object that was in the sky. we were driving into the sun, so i had some trouble seeing what she was pointing at in the sky. finally, i saw it. it was round and very far off in the distance. i said may be it is a star or planet that is just bright in the sky. it was bright white. the object was obviously in front of the sun, yet it did not look dark or shaddowed. the sun was around 10 o'clock in the sky and the object was around 11 o'clock. i also felt it could be a plane traveling in in a manner that made it seem still. however, i did not see any vapor trails. it appeared very far away. i was looking at thinking what kind of plane would be so bright. i figured it was a planet. then it moved. it was no longer bright white, it was black. it moved fast. all three of us watched it go north. i figured it was heading for lake michigan. it moved like nothing i know. it crossed the horizon and out of view in less than 5 seconds. there was no vapor trail. if it was a jet fighter, there was no sound. i just keept saying it's moving to fast to be a jet. it just moved like quickly dragging the mouse on a computer quickly from side to side. we pulled over near a field and tried to locate it again. if it was a plane, we would have seen it. visibility was excellent. all three of us witnessed this, my wife a little longer because she was not sure at first if it was really happening. the entire sighting lasted 3-4 mins. what ever that was today, someone else had to see. it was nothing i can explain without using the term "ufo". it really has me freaked out. i have never seen anything like this before. if it was just me, i would probably dismiss it as my own crazy mind, but all three of us saw it.
content.summary: Bright objet seen standing still in the sky, looked almost like a star. moved away at speed i have never known.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was outside my friend *(name deleted--cms/sg)apartment when we noticed an odd sporadic formation of lights.  they would flash all over the place like the object was a diamond or triangle, we saw the same type of lights a few nights later and were able to see the appox shape of the craft it's lights were so bright they lit up the clouds it was traveling through. both were completely silent and were visible for a min or two then gone, shortly after we heard what we believe to be military jets over head, it had to be no more then a min after the craft disappeared.  we noticed it because the sporadic pattern and the huge apparent size and its odd flight pattern over here, over there, making u turns.  at 1st we thought it might be a plane, then we saw a plane on the other side of the visible sky and no likeness.  the object made me feel apprehensive, it just seemed abnormal.  the video i've attached isn't the best, but you will see what i mean.
content.summary: Strange pattern of lights pulsing over wide range no pattern

content.detailedDescription: While driving in overland park ks, i decided to shop at one of the local department stores. after exiting the store i noticed a really bright light in the sky to the west. i then got out my camera and attempted to take a photograph of the object.  after taking a picture, we got in the car and drove in the direction of the object. we headed west to desoto kansas where we lost the object but we did manage to get a picture of it.
content.summary: Bright light in sky changing colors over desoto ks.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to get the cat and take it in for the night. i follow mufon daily and because of my interest, i glanced up to the sky just in time to see a very high star like object head south at a very rapid pace. much quicker than a satellite. as i watched, it disappeared as if someone turned off it's light.
content.summary: Larger than a star

content.detailedDescription:
I was just out to have a smoke and the stars are really nice tonight; i was seeing several shooting stars (3), so i thought i'd watch a minute more to see if there were others.

then, coming out of the west very fast was a bright orange elongated shape.  it was moving very fast and on an incredibly flat, straight path.  it did not veer even the slightest bit.

as it went toward the south it very suddenly slowed to a near stop.  at that point, i could easily make out that it appeared to have a sort of triangular shape ~ pointy in the front, tall in the back and still quite orange.  then it began to move very, very slowly until i lost sight of it behind the trees on our easterly property line.

i don't have much of a horizon to the southwest because of trees, so i can only see about an acre back.  i measured with my thumb and forefinger how far up it was from the ground at the back of the acre and that measurement was about 5". (sorry; i know nothing about degrees and angles) all of the movement it made continued on the same very straight line, never going above or below that 5" mark.

i called my husband to come out because i was just sure it would come out from behind those trees, but it never did, so it would have to have continue heading due south ~ otherwise i would have seen it come from behind the trees.  checked the clock and it would have been right about 8:20p (9th oct 2010) that i first saw it.
content.summary: Orange triangular object going fast out of west toward south then almost stopped before continuing on quite slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I am standing on my balcony just now and i see what looks like a bright star flashing far east of sagamore st very high in the sky. i looked through binoculars and saw a bunch of different color flashing lights but it was very far away. i did not think nothing of it until i noticed that within 20mins it has changed position in the sky radically 3 times by using a tree for refrence. it looks very strange and is just hovering there. i am surprised no planes have flew towards it.

i have tried taking pictures however it is too far away.
content.summary: At this moment there is a ufo east of my location high in the sky
